Package ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.View

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MainView<M>
    Simple Interface dictating basic aspects of views in this project.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FavouritesActivity
    A subclass of MasterActivity specialized to display questions the user has tagged as favourite.
    MainActivity
    A subclass of MasterActivity specialized to display the application's main page and list of questions.
    MainViewAdapter
    An extension of the view adapter class, used for displaying lists of Question objects.
    MainViewAdapter.MainViewAdapterHolder
    A container for the tags stored in a view object.
    MasterActivity
    Provides a general implementation of an Activity subclass.
    MyQuestionActivity
    A subclass of MasterActivity specialized to display the user's submitted questions.
    QuestionActivity
    An Activity subclass that displays a question page.
    QuestionViewAdapter
    An Adapter used to display a QuestionActivity
    SavedActivity
    A subclass of MasterActivity specialized to display the user's saved questions.
    SecureActivity
    Extends the Activity class in order to provide a specific handling of it's onResume() method that will then be passed on to all of its children classes.
    SubmitActivity
    A subclass of Activity that provides the basic functionality allowing the user to submit a question or an answer.
    SubmitAnswerActivity
    A subclass to the SubmitActivity class, providing a UI specializes to submitting Answer objects.
    SubmitQuestionActivity
    A subclass to the SubmitActivity class, providing a UI specializes to submitting Question objects.
    WelcomeActivity
    A subclass of Activity that provides a UI that allows the user to create a new User entry in the elastic search database, effectively registering them within the app.
